files.patch:
@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
-# Copyright (c) 2011, 2022, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+# Copyright (c) 2011, 2020, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -405,0 +405,1 @@
+    $1_MODFILES := $$($1_BIN)$$($1_MODULE_SUBDIR)/_the.$1_batch.modfiles
@@ -447,2 +448,1 @@
-    # Do the actual compilation
-    # Creates a file with all sources, to pass it to javac in an @file.
+    # Create a file with all sources, to pass to javac in an @file.
@@ -451,2 +451,1 @@
-    $$($1_COMPILE_TARGET): $$($1_SRCS) $$($1_DEPENDS) \
-        $$($1_VARDEPS_FILE) $$($1_EXTRA_DEPS) $$($1_JAVAC_SERVER_CONFIG)
+    $$($1_FILELIST): $$($1_SRCS) $$($1_VARDEPS_FILE)
@@ -454,1 +453,1 @@
-		$$(call LogWarn, Compiling up to $$(words $$($1_SRCS)) files for $1)
+		$$(call LogWarn, Compiling $$(words $$($1_SRCS)) files for $1)
@@ -456,1 +455,6 @@
-		$$(call WriteFile, "-XDmodifiedInputs=$$? ", $$@.modfiles)
+		$$(call WriteFile, "-XDmodifiedInputs=$$? ", $$($1_MODFILES))
+
+    # Do the actual compilation
+    $$($1_COMPILE_TARGET): $$($1_SRCS) $$($1_FILELIST) $$($1_DEPENDS) \
+        $$($1_VARDEPS_FILE) $$($1_EXTRA_DEPS) $$($1_JAVAC_SERVER_CONFIG)
+		$$(call MakeDir, $$(@D))
@@ -460,1 +464,1 @@
-		        @$$@.modfiles \
+		        @$$($1_MODFILES) \
